title: Choosing a chain
description: Selecting a base chain is an important step in any application’s design and, especially, for tables.

frontMatter.title: Choosing a chain
frontMatter.description: Selecting a base chain is an important step in any application’s design and, especially, for tables.
frontMatter.synopsis: Chain selection makes a significant impact on a table’s usability. Choose a chain that’s too slow or expensive, and it won’t be feasible for table writes to occur frequently. Deploy a cross-chain data model for value layering purposes, and certain on-chain access control features are lost.
